code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='http://localhost:3001/api';export const authService={async login(credentials){try{const response=await axios.post(`${API_URL}/auth/login`,credentials);if(response.data.success&&response.data.data.token){localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(response.data.data));return response.data.data;}throw new Error(response.data.message||'Đăng nhập thất bại');}catch(error){var _error$response,_error$response$data;throw new Error(((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:(_error$response$data=_error$response.data)===null||_error$response$data===void 0?void 0:_error$response$data.message)||'Đăng nhập thất bại');}},logout(){localStorage.removeItem('user');},getCurrentUser(){const userStr=localStorage.getItem('user');if(userStr)return JSON.parse(userStr);return null;}};
